Content:
hi,

I'm new here and a new rider.
now I want to buy a bike and the sales men I spoke to from different brands just confuse me more.
I need your help to choose a super sports bike that is aimed to be a fun and fast bike!
I'm can't decide between Kawasaki ZX-6R 2024 & Honda CBR600R 2024.
what should I pick and are there other options to consider?

thanks!
